pages.title: Swiftness/Power Essence: Tier 1
pages.text: You can acquire Tier 1 Swiftness/Power Essence via killing an Undead Sensei. It has a chance to drop either tier 1 Swiftness, tier 1 Power Essence... Or nothing lol

pages.name: Undead Sensei
pages.text: More info about this mob in the Mobs Category.

pages.title: Swiftness Essence: Tier 2
pages.text: You can acquire Tier 2 Swiftness Essence via killing bob- Uhh I mean, the Exiled Sensei. He has a chance to drop either that or a tier 1 Power Essence... Or once again a chance for nothing ;)

pages.name: Exiled Sensei
pages.text: More info about bob-Exiled Sensei in the Mobs Category.

pages.title: Swiftness Essence: Tier 3
pages.text: You can acquire Tier 3 Swiftness Essence via killing an Exiled Devil... You know what I was gonna say.

pages.name: Exiled Devil
pages.text: More info on the Exiled Devil in the Mobs Category
